postData.contentHtml: We often read something inspiring like "Atomic Habits" or "4000 Weeks" and think yes, if only everyone read this book and they took the advice to heart. Then we go about our daily business barely impacted. First take it upon yourself to do the hard deliberate practice. Then let your actions speak to those around you. After all, you really can't know who's going to take your example to heart.
postData.title: Turn Inward First
